Uses of Class
Modele.Observable

  • Packages that use Observable 
    Package Description
    Modele  
    Vue  
    VueText  

    • Uses of Observable in Modele

      Subclasses of Observable in Modele 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Jest
      This class represents the Jest in the game.
      class  Joueur
      This class represents the player and is the superclass of the Virtual and Physical player.
      class  JoueurPhys
      Inherits from the Joueur, doesn't implement any methods but instead call methods from the superclass.
      class  JoueurVirt
      This class inherits from Joueur and is the main user of the Strategy design pattern.
      class  Main
      This class represents the hand of the player, it is a distinction between a player having cards, and a hand containing those cards.
      class  Partie
      The core of the game, the Partie class inherits Observable and is where the game plays on console and a major part of it is used for the GUI interaction.
      class  Pioche
      This class inherits from the Tas, which is a composition of Cartes
      class  Tas
      This class is the superclass for all collections of cards, it contains a list of cards and is observable.
      class  Trophee
      This class represents the trophy, it contains an array of 2 cards which are the trophies.
      Methods in Modele with parameters of type Observable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Observer.update(Observable a, java.lang.Object o)
      This is the update method that all classes that implements Observer has to implement.

    • Uses of Observable in Vue

      Methods in Vue with parameters of type Observable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TableDeJeu.update(Observable o, java.lang.Object arg1)
      This method implements the Observer design pattern, it updates the position of the trophy cards if they were taken.
      void PanelJoueur.update(Observable o, java.lang.Object a)
      This method implements the Observer design pattern, it calls for an update in cards if any changes occurred.
      void PanelJeu.update(Observable o, java.lang.Object arg1)
      This is the method that implements the Observer design pattern, it updates each time the round number changes.

    • Uses of Observable in VueText

      Methods in VueText with parameters of type Observable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void VueText.update(Observable o, java.lang.Object a)
